sentences.sentence: The first female troupe (剧团) of Yue opera was created in 1923, and then female performers gradually took the place of the males.
sentences.translation: 1923年，第一个女子越剧团成立，随后女演员逐渐取代了男演员的位置。

sentences.sentence: The dancing troupe will give three performances at the Century Theatre.
sentences.translation: 这个舞蹈团将在世纪剧院演出三场。

sentences.sentence: O Troupe of little vagrants of the world, leave your footprints in my words.
sentences.translation: 世界上的一小队小小的漂泊者呀， 请留下你们的脚印在我的文字里。
